skills.name: Wooden plank
skills.description: You took this wooden plank in order to attack the enemies, it might not be the best weapon but it is effective.

skills.name: The bible
skills.description: You are a religious man that always carries a bible in your bag, now you have to defend yourself in the name of God.

skills.name: Brew
skills.description: You saw this strange drink on a table and you thought that it could be useful to recover yourself.

skills.name: injection
skills.description: You saw the doctor's suitcase and decided to take some stuff. However you didn't notice that it was a shot of adrenaline that will provide you with a boost.

skills.name: Special soup
skills.description: When you arrive to the kitchen you find a pot with a soup but what you didn't notice is that you it will boost your hp and def.

skills.name: Carrot's shurikens
skills.description: When you are in the kitchen you find 3 carrots and why wouldn't you use them to attack enemies.

skills.name: Haunted pen
skills.description: When you arrived to the hall you saw a pen levitating and you decided to take it with you and not to write anything. The pen throws 2 burst of ink that hurt and increases your hp

skills.name: Ceiling light jump
skills.description: You hang from a ceiling light on the roof and attack your enemies from above, although you may get hurt in the process.

skills.name: Whisperwind sweep
skills.description: It is an enchanted broom that transcends its mundane origins to become a formidable tool of combat

skills.name: Warming chandelier
skills.description: This object keeps you warm, providing hp and attack for 3 turns.

skills.name: Sclading sip
skills.description: Take a sip of this tea, providing you with a sudden burst of energy. Be careful not to hurt yourself though, it's still hot.

skills.name: Umbrella's fury
skills.description: Strike your enemies with this common day object able to expand itself for a quick and powerful attack.

skills.name: Rudder's spin
skills.description: Throw your trusty boomerang towards a target. Watch your back when catching it back since your guard will be down against attacks in that time.

skills.name: Telescope vision
skills.description: Take a step back and observe your enemies through a telescope. This allows you to spot their weak points and take a breather from the fight.

skills.name: Fit of rage
skills.description: A desperate attemp at self defense that catches enemies off guard. The dangerous movements performed leave you vulnerable against your opponents.
